mapper.insert: INSERT INTO party (sno, bplc_nm, writer, title, content, max, file_name, upload_path) VALUES (#{sno}, #{bplcNm}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{max}, #{fileName}, #{uploadPath})
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, s.rdn_whl_addr FROM party p JOIN store s ON p.sno = s.sno ORDER BY party_no DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{cpp}
mapper.update: UPDATE party SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_date = current_timestamp WHERE party_no = #{partyNo}
